registry.title: Mobile IP Message Types
registry.note: Mobile IP defines a set of new control messages, sent with UDP or TCP using well-known port number 434. Currently, the following are defined.

registry.title: Extensions to Mobile IP Registration Messages
registry.note: The first set consists of those Extensions which may appear only in Mobile IP control messages (those sent to and from UDP port number 434).

record.description: Generalized Link Layer Address Registration Extension

registry.title: Mobile IP Extensions for ICMP Router Discovery messages
registry.note: The second set consists of those extensions which may appear only in ICMP Router Discovery messages RFC1256.

record.description: One-byte Padding (encoded with no Length nor Data field)
Non-skippable Adv. Extension for Experimental use
Generalized Link Layer Address Advertisement Extension
Skippable Adv. Extension for Experimental use

registry.title: Extension Subtypes
registry.note: To conserve the type number space, extension types may have sub-types. Currently the following extensions have subtypes defined:

record.description: Not to be allocated - used by early implementations

registry.title: Code Values for Mobile IP Registration Reply Messages

record.description: Error Codes from the Foreign Agent
Error Codes from the Home Agent
Error Codes from the Gateway Foreign Agent
Error Codes form the Correspondent Node
registration accepted, but simultaneous mobility bindings unsupported

registry.title: Registration denied by the foreign agent

record.description: reverse runnel is mandatory and 'T' bit not set
home agent host unreachable (ICMP error received)
home agent port unreachable (ICMP error received)
home agent unreachable (other ICMP error received)
Non-zero HA address required in Registration Request
Error code from Foreign Agent => fa_bad_aaa_auth
Error code from Foreign Agent => ha_wrong_challenge
Error code from Foreign Agent => REPLAY_PROT_UNAVAIL
Error code from Foreign Agent => ZERO_COA_NOT_SUPP
FA Error Code for Experimental use

registry.title: Registration denied by the home agent

record.description: reverse runnel is mandatory and 'T' bit not set
Error code from Home Agent => ha_bad_aaa_auth
Error code from Home Agent => ZERO_CAREOF_ADDRESS
Error code from Home Agent => DYN_GFA_NOT_SUPP
Mobile Router operation is not permitted (HA_MOBNET_DISALLOWED)
HA Error Code for Experimental use

registry.title: Registration denied by the gateway foreign agent
Error Codes from the Correspondent Node
Security Parameter Index (SPI) Values for the Mobile IP Reserved SPIs
registry.registration_rule: Must be specified and approved by the MIP4 working group

registry.title: Generalized Link Layer Address Registration Extension Subtypes and Generalized Link Layer Address Advertisement Extension Subtypes

record.description: 3GPP2 International Mobile Station Identity and Connection ID

registry.title: Code Values for Mobile IP Handoff Reply Messages (Value 17)

record.description: Mobile Router is not authorized for prefix (MOBNET_UNAUTHORIZED)
Home Agent cannot assign a mobile network prefix (MOBNET_UNASSIGNED)
registration accepted, IPv6 to be tunneled to HoA
registration accepted, IPv6 to be tunneled to CoA

Mobile Router Route Optimization Capability Extension (Value 153)
